messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Yurts
messages.msgSnippet: OK. so I ask my dh about cob houses, cause I just think he knows anything (read an entire encyclopedia set when he was 14 and from that referenced out books he
messages.messageBody:
OK. so I ask my dh about cob houses, cause I just think he knows anything
(read an entire encyclopedia set when he was 14 and from that referenced out
books he has read on piles of topics, so thought how could he not. but he
didn't!!!) and he didn't know a thing! So we did a search on google and
found some pretty cool looking cob houses. I love the softness of look of
them with the rounded walls and corners. And I like that you can build in
niches and cubbies through out. Then found a site about Vancouver ( I am
just south of it) and there is a cob house building project going on in
Stanley park this summer!!! So we are going to head down there and have a
look. so cool!



Thanks,



Sherri-Lee



_____

From: Ren [mailto:starsuncloud@...]
Sent: Saturday, August 07, 2004 10:24 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Yurts





"Last night I heard the word "yurt" for the first time. had to look
into it
and spent an hour looking at them on the web. Now I know about them and I
doubt I will spend a lot of time looking into them anymore. but it is one
more bit of info. This unschooling road is pretty cool."

YES!!
Now you're onto something a few of us at this list are passionate
about...YURTS.:)
I love the idea of living in a yurt style house actually. There's an
unschooler out in AZ living in a round house (inspired by yurts) and I
believe Kelly and Ben's next house will be a round house.

If you think yurts are cool, check into cob houses! Oh my gosh, they are
awesome. I want to build one in my backyard so bad....
It's an earth house (actually, look up earth houses at google, there are all
kinds) that is SCULPTED. Can you imagine a better project for an artistic
soul? Sculpting your home? I want a cob house!!

Ren

Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/

messages.messageBody:
OH heehee. hit on one of your passions huh? I will look up cob houses and
have a look.



Not really interested in living in one, but they are cool to look at.



Sherri-Lee
